Question 42) Water use increases according to the needs of the population in the world. However, unlike one might imagine, the increase in water consumption has over two times the population growth during the twentieth century.
TEIXEIRA, W. et al. Deciphering the earth. Sao Paulo: Cia. National Publisher, 2009.
A socio -spatial strategy that can contribute to alter the water use logic presented in the text is the
A) expansion of water reuse systems.
B) expansion of crop sprinkling irrigation.
C) Intensification of forest deforestation control.
D) adoption of traditional production techniques.
E) Creation of tax incentives for the cultivation of organic products.
